segments.text: Do you think it's time to sign the contract , Mr . Simpson ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to look it over before I sign it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , no problem . I hope there are no questions about the terms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am fully satisfied with the terms of this contract .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall we sign this contract now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Where do you want me to sign ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . ( Sign ) Once a contract is signed , it has legal effect .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right . Thank you for your cooperation .
segments.speaker: S1
